Detailed Description

Exposes methods for accessing exported functions.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktExportedFunction::Addr ( [out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal)
get

Get the address of the function.

Parameters
[in,out]pValAddress of pointer to store function address.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
